data.title: Unprofessional and not dependable
data.text:
Bought a Groupon for the Southside tour and booked online twice.  Each booking was cancelled only 2 days prior the the scheduled event because they didn't have enough seats on the bus purchased.  Once  I can forgive, but  twice is just unprofessional.

When I emailed the owner to point it out there was no apology or attempt to remedy, only the following:

"Groupon will process your refund. We will refund your service fee as well. If you have any issues processing through groupon let us know.

Thanks 

Kevin"

data.title: Great way to tour local breweries!
data.text: Bus and driver were great!  We visited four local breweries and samples at each brewery were included. Would definitely do again!
